login.name: CloudOne
login.welcome1: Welcome to our admin panel. Please login using the form or register for a new account using the button below.
login.welcome2: Portal is an amazing and easy to use Admin template. If you have any questions feel free to contact us in our support forum.

register.register1: It takes a couple of minutes to sign up for a free account.
register.register2: Just fill in your details to gain access the admin panel and view the dashboard.
register.register3: By creating an account, you agree to our Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy.
